attributes.action: increase the fuel allowance for all community nursing staff and public sector workers who use their cars in the course of their employment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To increase the mileage allowance paid to community nursing staff and public sector workers who use their cars for work. This allowance has not been increased since 2000 and they are now funding the government out of their salaries, due to all increases levied on car owners e.g petrol, mot costs, insurance increases. This in effect has reduced the 1.9% pay deal awarded in 2007.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
